group_1.textCenter: The week that Ryuugasaki gave us is almost up...
So you have to make up your minds now...
You two are the only ones left...

group_1.textRight: I promise that the other Torayamachi girls and I will @make your dream come true one day...
The future that you've always envisioned...

group_1.textLeft: I wish I could see it with my own eyes, but @I am excited for you to make it a reality.

group_1.textRight: Now it's just you and me, Yuna.

group_1.textLeft: You should join Ryuugasaki as well. @That would be the best option.

group_1.textRight: If I do, I'll lose the most important thing in my life.

group_1.textLeft: Is it something more important than your life @itself?

group_1.textRight: It IS my life... The life I was given...
'Cause you see... Yuna... You're my life.

group_1.textLeft: That's so touching, yet so cruel...
A lot of people will be devastated if they lose you.

group_1.textRight: I'm gonna be doomed to become a Witch if you @die, anyway.
So we may as well die and go to Hell together.

group_1.textLeft: If you're that determined, then there is nothing @that I can do to stop you.
Shall we walk down Yomotsuhirasaka together?
The path to the land of the dead.

group_1.narration: A few days later, a mentally exhausted Yuna suffered @a crushing defeat against Juri and became a Witch. @Hikaru defeated the Witch, before becoming one herself.
The meaningless battle left every Magical Girl in @Futatsugi City with a feeling of unease.
Ryuugasaki never found out why the Witches vanished. @Without anyone to fight against, they just barely scrape by @each day in a city where countless Magical Girls had been culled.

group_1.textCenter: The culling hasn't eased our concerns.
Unless we find out the cause of the Witches' disappearance, we'll keep living in fear.
Fear that one day, we'll be bled dry...

group_1.narration: The reason why Witches disappeared has been the @biggest mystery of all to Futatsugi's Magical Girls. @Whether or not Yuna decides to investigate it further will @determine which direction the gears of fate turn.
